typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Filename as string ('sales_2019.csv')
}
source(output(
		p_id as short,
		c_id as short,
		no_of_units as short,
		date_purchased as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($Filename)]) ~> SalesFile
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(sales_id) from SalesLT.sales',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxSalesId
